subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/charge up my Sony.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : I record this at the water trough on June 14. I have my New (to me) Sony TCM-5000 strapped to my bike seat (not turned on). I am asking if they can "maybe do something with the circuits....or CHARGE it up" As I listen I hear (low audio) wump-wump-wump (loud ringing sound) then (low audio) wuuump-wuuump. Maybe they DID or WILL do something :) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/charge%20up%20my%20Sony.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
